```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

View diamonds dataset run in console

```{r}
view(diamonds)
```

```{r}
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```

## Creating plot with diamonds dataset

```{r}
c <- GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)
```

## Creating GGplot with diamonds

```{r}
ggplot(data= diamonds, aes(x= price, y= carat))+
       geom_jitter()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data= diamonds, aes(x=carat))+
       geom_histogram()
```
